versos: (zaccur) 1 Chronicles 2:42 - "After Hanoch, zaccur's family line developed into the entire family of Sheshan.";;;

(shaphat) Jeremiah 5:28 - "They are fat, they are sleek, they also excel in deeds of wickedness; They do not plead the cause, the cause of the orphan, that they may prosper; And they do not defend the rights of the poor.";;;
(caleb) Numbers 14:24 - "'But because my servant caleb has a different spirit and follows me wholeheartedly, I will bring him into the land he went to, and his descendants will inherit it.";;;
(ammiel) Numbers 13:12 - from the tribe of Dan
(spy) Numbers 13:2 - "Send some men to explore the land of Canaan, which I am giving to the Israelites. From each ancestral tribe send one of its leaders.";;;
(holds) 1 Peter 1:5 - who through faith are shielded by God's power until the coming of the salvation that is ready to be revealed in the last time.;;;
(courage) Joshua 1:9 - "Have I not commanded you Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged, for the Lord your God will be with you wherever you go.";;;
(rehob) 2 Chronicles 27:4 - Moreover he built cities in the mountains of Judah
(stature) Luke 19:3 - "He was trying to see who Jesus was, but because he was short he could not see over the crowd.";;;
(rebel) 1 Samuel 15:23 - For rebellion is like the sin of divination
(daytime) John 9:4 - "As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.";;;
(miracles) John 2:11 - "What Jesus did here in Cana of Galilee was the first of the signs through which he revealed his glory; and his disciples believed in him.";;;
(wasted) Ephesians 5:18 - "Do not get drunk on wine, which leads to debauchery. Instead, be filled with the Spirit.";;;

(hormah) Numbers 21:3 - "And the Lord hearkened to the voice of Israel, and delivered up the Canaanites; and they utterly destroyed them and their cities: and he called the name of the place hormah.";;;
(sinneth) 1 John 3:9 - Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin; for his seed remaineth in him: and he cannot sin, because he is born of God.;;;
